channel.title: Forgotten Souls
channel.description:
Client Download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/13423089/Forgotten%20%20Client.rar
Forums: http://forgottensouls.greatestboard.com/
Working Grand Exchange! Dungeoneering just like runescape! PvM! PvP! Dicing! Staking! Flower Game! Max Cape! Comp Cape! New Fire Cape! Fun Minigames! Great Staff! Glacors! Jadinkos! Ganodermic Beasts!
Vote for the server as well: http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/vote-17531.html
Will also edit details.
